recipe.title: Snicker Cake
instructions: Mix cake as directed. Pour 1/2 of batter into greased 9 x 13 inch pan. Bake 20 mins. at 350°. Melt caramels with butter & milk. Pour over baked cake. Sprinkle choco. chips and walnuts over caramels. Pour remaining cake batter over cake. Bake 20 mins. at 250° and 10 mins at 350°. Cool before cutting.
